content.prompt: What are all values of p for which the series  ∑ n = 1 ∞ 1 n 2 p + n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42B0@  diverges?

choices.label: p ≤ 1 / 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE8@

p ≥ 1 / 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AF9@
